IoTFoundry

This site provides the umbrella architecture and governance documentation for the IoTFoundry project family. Implementation code and libraries live in separate sub-project repositories; links to those projects appear on the “Related Projects” page.

Use the navigation above to explore Architecture, Governance, Specifications, and Resources.

For the repository README and quick links, see the GitHub repo root.

See repository for license and governance documents.
